LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBasicResearch.label: basic plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBasicResearch.description: Lightweight bio-plastic from plant materials. Basic-grade material suitable for simple furniture and structures.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIndustrialResearch.label: industrial plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIndustrialResearch.descriptio: Advanced bio-plastic with enhanced durability. Industrial-grade material for high-quality furniture and robust structures.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBioSteelResearch.label: plastic Bio-Steel
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBioSteelResearch.description: Advanced plastic bio-engineered steel created by reinforcing plant-based polymers with metallic compounds. While not as strong as spacer-tech materials, it offers an excellent balance of durability and sustainability for colonial construction.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticFiberResearch.label: plastic fiber
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticFiberResearch.description: Synthetic textile fiber from bio-plastic. Suitable for clothing production and textile crafting.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIncendiaryResearch.label: incendiary plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIncendiaryResearch.descriptio: Bio-plastic infused with volatile compounds. Extremely flammable construction material for tactical applications. Handle with care.
LanguageData.RSF_EcoLeatherResearch.label: eco leather
LanguageData.RSF_EcoLeatherResearch.description: Synthetic leather from plant polymers. Sustainable alternative to animal leather for high-quality clothing.
